Name: Flense

Characteristics.Target: One creature or object within short range

Description: Windborne grit scours your target. Make a Will attack roll against the targetâ€™s Strength. On a success, the target takes 2d6 + 3 damage. A living creature that becomes incapacitated by this damage dies instantly, its flesh (if any) stripped from its bones.

Name: Magic Dart

Characteristics.Target: One creature or object within long range

Description: A magical dart flies from your fingertip. The dart automatically hits, provided there is an unobstructed path between you and the target. The target takes 1d3 + 1 damage.

Name: Arcane Shield
Description: For the duration, a barrier of energy shields you, imposing 1 bane on attack rolls against your Defense or Agility.

Extra Effects.Name: Triggered
Extra Effects.Description: When a creature makes an attack roll against your Defense or Agility, you can use a triggered action to cast this spell. The triggering creature makes the attack roll with 3 banes, and then the effect ends.
